alert.note: Alert for Bedford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 02 at 9:12AM CST until March 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Bedford, Coffee, Giles, Grundy, Hickman, Lawrence, Lewis, Marshall, Maury, Perry and Wayne. * WHEN...Through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
